1572299410_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2.body: Well, I read that TOR was the brain child of some Navy officers in the 1990s. Its original purpose was to secure communications for the U.S. military abroad. It was later abandoned. It gained new life with the founders of the Tor Project in 1999 or early 2000s; early on it had problems that could be exploited, especially with rise of flash player.

1572721528_19XCfah7iuo9zYqk7GoTDXVNp4p5B.body: I think it's possible with tails. I had zeronet downloaded to tails, although that's all I could get to work. Albiet, I'm not good with the computers and such.
